fullText: Janet McTeer and Liev Schreiber bring star power and sexual heat to Christopher Hampton's adaptation of Choderlos de Laclos' epistolary novel about aristocratic libertines.
dtliExcerpt: Janet McTeer and Liev Schreiber bring star power and sexual heat to Christopher Hampton's adaptation of Choderlos de Laclos' epistolary novel about aristocratic libertines.
